revision.text: '''Intermission''' refers broadly to anything that is part of an on-going game and before or after a level, without being a level itself. There are two kinds of intermission: #Tally: this screen (not seen in [[hub]]s) debriefs on the finished [[level]], providing the player's score in killing monsters, finding secrets and picking up items. It also presents the name of the next level. In [[Doom]] and [[Heretic]], these screens are used to present a [[intermission script|scripted overworld map]] showing the player's progression. #Story: this screen or series of screen narrates the story so far with text or images. This, too, can be scripted, using an [[intermission definition]] in [[MAPINFO]]. [[Category:Glossary]]
